Package org.melior.client.corba

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CorbaException<E extends UserException>
    Translate a CORBA user exception to a standard remoting exception.
    CorbaMethod<T extends IDLEntity>
    Execute a method on a CORBA client stub.
    CorbaStub<T extends IDLEntity>
    Build a client stub for the local CORBA object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection<T extends IDLEntity>
    Implements a wrapper around a CORBA Connection delegate.
    ConnectionFactory<T extends IDLEntity>
    Implements a factory for persistent CORBA Connection objects.
    ConnectionManager<T extends IDLEntity>
    Implements a manager for persistent CORBA Connection objects, for connections to remote CORBA object.
    CorbaClient<T extends IDLEntity,E extends UserException>
    Implements an easy to use, auto-configuring CORBA client with connection pooling and configurable backoff strategy.
    CorbaClientBuilder<T extends IDLEntity,E extends UserException>
    Convenience class for building a CorbaClient.
